Script.name: Load Map settings
Script.script:
mapwin = mapwin or {} mapwin.windows = mapwin.windows or {} mapwin.labelbox = mapwin.labelbox or {} mapwin.labels = mapwin.labels or {} mapwin.labelWidth = 100 mapwin.labelHeight = 25 mapwin.windowlist = {"Map", "Room Info", "Dir Queue"} mapwin.width = "420" mapwin.height = "300" mapwin.border = 25 favorites = {} favorites.labels = {}
function mapwin:ResetUI() --width, height = getMainWindowSize() --[[ mapwin.container = Geyser.Container:new({ fontSize = 8, x=width-mapwin.width-mapwin.border, y=height-mapwin.height-mapwin.border, width=mapwin.width, height=mapwin.height, name="mapwinWindow", })]] end
function mapwinSwitch(win) local oldwin = mapwin.currentWindow if oldwin and mapwin.windows[oldwin] and mapwin.windows[win] then if mapwin.windows[oldwin] then mapwin.windows[oldwin]:hide() end mapwin.labels[oldwin]:setColor(50,50,50) mapwin.labels[oldwin]:echo(oldwin, "white", "c") end mapwin.currentWindow = win mapwin.windows[win]:show() mapwin.labels[win]:setColor(0,125,0) mapwin.labels[win]:echo(win, "cyan", "c") end
function mapwin:create() --reset the UI mapwin:ResetUI() width, height = getMainWindowSize() local sx = width-mapwin.width-mapwin.border local sy = height-mapwin.height-mapwin.border --iterate the table of channels and create some windows and tabs for i,tab in ipairs(mapwin.windowlist) do mapwin.labels[tab] = Geyser.Label:new({ name=string.format("label%s", tab), x=sx+mapwin.labelWidth*i, y=sy, width=mapwin.labelWidth, height=mapwin.labelHeight, nestable=true, flyOut=true }) mapwin.labels[tab]:echo(tab, "white", "c") mapwin.labels[tab]:setColor(50,50,50) if tab ~= "Dir Queue" then mapwin.labels[tab]:setClickCallback("mapwinSwitch", tab) end if tab == "Map" then mapwin.windows[tab] = Geyser.Mapper:new({ x = sx, y = sy+mapwin.labelHeight, height = mapwin.height, width = mapwin.width, name = string.format("mapwin%s", tab), })--, mapwin.container) mapwin.windows[tab]:hide() elseif tab == "Dir Queue" then else mapwin.windows[tab] = Geyser.MiniConsole:new({ x = sx, y = sy+mapwin.labelHeight, height = "100%", width = "100%", name = string.format("mapwin%s", tab), })--, mapwin.container) mapwin.windows[tab]:setFontSize(8) mapwin.windows[tab]:setColor(0,0,0) mapwin.windows[tab]:setWrap(60) mapwin.windows[tab]:hide() end end mapwinSwitch("Map") end
function mapwin:ClearWindow(win) clearUserWindow(string.format("mapwin%s", win)) end
function mapwin:AppendWindow(win, text) mapwin.windows[win]:cecho(text) end
function mapwin:AppendWindowClickable(win, text, command, tip) echoLink(mapwin.windows[win].name, text, command, tip) end
function mapwin:updateRoomInfo() mapwin:ClearWindow("Room Info") updatedesc = getRoomUserData( tmap.lastId, "description") local exits = getAllExits(tmap.lastId) local exitlist = "Exits: " updatedesc = string.gsub(updatedesc, ".\n", " ") mapwin:AppendWindow("Room Info", "<cyan>"..updatedesc.."\n") local exitlen = 0 --for wrapping if exits then for v,i in pairs(exits) do exitlen = exitlen+string.len(i) if exitlen > 30 then mapwin:AppendWindow("Room Info", "\n") exitlen=0 end mapwin:AppendWindowClickable("Room Info", i..", ", [[send("]]..i..[[");onFollow("]]..i..[[")]], i) end end end
if not mapwin.windows["Map"] then mapwin:create() end --mapwin:create()

Script.name: Create Favorites
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- function mapwin:setupFavorites() favTable = searchRoomUserData("favorite", "") favSorted = {} unsorted = {} addMapMenu("Favorites") for i,v in pairs(favTable) do --repetitive but straightforward implementation local entry = string.split(v,'|||') local name, fav, room, parent = entry[1],entry[2],entry[3],entry[4] if parent then favSorted[parent] = favSorted[parent] or {} favSorted[parent][fav]={name,room} else -- unsorted end --add parents to their respective list so the player can actually click on them end if favSorted['-1'] then for i,v in pairs(favSorted['-1']) do if favSorted[i] then --designate -1 so we can keep the parent in order favSorted[i]['-1']={v[1], v[2]} end end end nestItem=0 for i,v in pairs(favSorted) do if v["-1"] then local k=v["-1"] local nest = k[1]..tostring(k[2])..tostring(nestItem) addMapMenu(nest, "Favorites", k[1]) for j,t in pairs(v) do if j~="-1" then local entry=t[1]..tostring(t[2])..tostring(j) addMapEvent(entry, "onFavorite", nest, t[1], t[2]) end end nestItem=nestItem+1 else for j,k in pairs(v) do addMapEvent(k[1]..tostring(k[2]), "onFavorite", "Favorites", k[1], k[2]) end end
end end
mapwin:setupFavorites()

Script.name: Direction Queue
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- function mapwin:updateDirQueue() if not mapwin.dirLabels then mapwin.dirLabels = {} end for i,v in pairs(mapwin.dirLabels) do deleteLabel("dwin"..tostring(i))--mapwin.dirLabels[i]:hide() end if #tmap.comTable > 0 then mapwin.labels["Dir Queue"]:echo(tmap.comTable[1],"white", "c") end if #tmap.comTable > 1 then for i,v in ipairs(tmap.comTable) do echo("fd") mapwin.dirLabels[i] = mapwin.labels["Dir Queue"]:addChild({name="dwin"..tostring(i), height=mapwin.labelHeight, width=mapwin.labelWidth, layoutDir="LV", flyOut=true}) --display(mapwin.dirLabels) echo("fs") mapwin.dirLabels[i]:echo(v,"white", "c") mapwin.dirLabels[i]:setClickCallback("mapwinDirClear", i) mapwin.dirLabels[i]:show() end end end --table.insert(tmap.comTable,"east") mapwin:updateDirQueue()
function mapwinDirClear(dirIndex) display(dirIndex) display(tmap.comTable) for i=1,dirIndex do table.remove(tmap.comTable,1) end mapwin:updateDirQueue() end
